name: solaria-cms
description: CMS-System build on the Solaria Core    The CMS is build for smal gaming communitys who don't have normaly a programmer.   The goal of the CMS is it to provide a simple installation and bring some   features that a gaming community needs like:    * TS/Discord and Steam intergation   * Simple and easy rule system   * Lightweight forum * Highly customize styles    and so on...
